resources.string: For multiple package names, separate them with a comma (,).
Click on Confirm to delete the selected Event.
Are you sure you want to delete %s?
Are you sure you want to delete this %s permanently? This cannot be undone.
An APK named %s already exists at /sketchware/signed_apk/. Overwrite it?
The generated .aab file must be signed.\nCopy your keystore to /Internal storage/sketchware/keystore/release_key.jks and enter the alias\' password.
To sign an APK, you need a keystore. Use your already created one, and copy it to /Internal storage/sketchware/keystore/release_key.jks and enter the alias\'s password.
You can find the generated, signed AAB file at:\n/Internal storage/sketchware/signed_aab/%s
Reset excluded built-in libraries? This action cannot be undone.
This library \"%s\" already used in your project, removing it may break your project. Do you want to continue removing it?
Please enable AppCompat first to use this feature
Are you sure you want to delete this block?
For multiple package names, separate them with a comma (,).
For multiple package names, separate them with a comma (,).
An error occurred while running Sketchware Pro. Do you want to report this error log so that we can fix it? No personal information will be included.
An error occurred while running Sketchware Pro. Do you want to report this error log so that we can fix it? No personal information will be included.
Failed to parse %s from file %s. Fix by renaming old file to %s.bak? If not, no %s will be used.
Found invalid %s data type in Custom Event #%d
Found invalid (null) Custom Event at position %d
Make sure you select a file that contains selector item(s).
An error occurred while trying to get the selector
Please enter a valid HEX color
Downloading projects is unavailable right now!
You cannot change the name of this selector
An item with this name already exists
Circular dependency found in \"%s\"\nPlease resolve the issue before saving
An error occurred. Check the log for more details.
This Block Menu was initially used to parse resource values, but was too I/O heavy and has been removed due to that. Please use the Code Editor instead.
A directory important for building is missing. Sketchware Pro can try creating %s if you\'d like to.
A file needed for building is missing. Put the correct file back to %s and try building again.

This defines how SWB backup files get named.
Available variables:
 - $projectName - Project name
 - $versionCode - App version code
 - $versionName - App version name
 - $pkgName - Package name
Manage your own blocks to use in Logic Editor
Manage your own block selector menus
Open Sketchware Pro\'s directory and edit files in it
Sign an APK file with testkey
Sign an already existing APK file with testkey and signature schemes up to V4
Are you sure you want to delete this item?
Enter the name of the new folder
File extension will be added automatically based on the file type you select
Enter a name for the new %s
Are you sure you want to delete this %s? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to reset all permissions?
Starting with Android 11, Sketchware Pro needs a new permission to avoid taking ages to build projects. Don\'t worry, we can\'t do more to storage than with current granted permissions.
Don\'t forget to enable D8 to be able to compile Java 8+ code
Note that this option may cause issues if RequestNetwork component is used
Please select an APK file to sign
No AppCompat options are currently available in this activity.
Please enable AppCompat in the Library Manager to use it.
You\'re not currently in the Activity layout.
Are you sure you want to reset appcompat attributes for %s?
Use AppCompat Manager to modify attributes for CoordinatorLayout, Toolbar, and other appcompat layout/widget.
Keep this screen open then run your app
Either enter a hex color code or pick a color from the list below.
Let's continue working on the project
This will enable ViewBinding in your project. Note: Manual changes may be required for widgets used in ASD block
This will remove methods in files, like showMessage, getDip, etc.
This will replace e.g. Button with MaterialButton, be careful!
This icon is available under the Apache Licence Version 2.0. Press to read more.
Start by creating a new one
This is still a basic implementation of the projects store. We're actively working on improving it. Stay tuned!
Activating StringFog will encrypt the strings in compilation time, which will make your app more difficult to reverse-engineer.
This is how your font looks like.
Enable this feature if disabled, and tap a floating action button to select and exclude built-in library.
This might break your project if you don't know what you're doing!
Custom View can be used to change the way items are displayed inside the ListView or the Spinner
Get your projects in a couple of clicks
Enable debug logcat logs viewable in Logcat Reader. Not enabled in exported AABs/APKs.
May slow down loading blocks in Logic Editor.
All variable blocks will be visible, even if you don\'t have variables for them.
Every single available block will be shown. Will slow down opening palettes!
Automatically installs project APKs after building using root access.
Opens projects automatically after auto-installation using root.
Enables custom version code and name for projects.
Enables syntax highlighting while editing blocks\' text parameters.
May slow down loading blocks in Logic Editor.
All variable blocks will be visible, even if you don't have variables for them.
Every single available block will be shown. Will slow down opening palettes!
Automatically installs project APKs after building using root access.
Opens projects automatically after auto-installation using root.
Enables custom version code and name for projects.
Enables syntax highlighting while editing blocks' text parameters.
Enter modifier e.g. private, public, public static, or empty (package private).
